claims.object: the part of the trigger mechanism that holds the hammer, striker, or bolt back until the correct amount of pressure has been applied to the trigger
releasing the hammer, striker, or bolt to discharge the weapon

surface_layer.definition: The sear is a part of the trigger mechanism that holds back the hammer, striker, or bolt until the trigger is pulled.

deep_layer.mechanism: The sear engages with the hammer/striker/bolt, preventing it from moving forward until the trigger is pulled, disengaging the sear.
